name: finch-css
description: A Sass framework for writing scalable css

scripts.demo:css: rm -rf demo-css/styles && npx sass --no-source-map src:demo-css/styles && serve -p 6060 demo-css
scripts.demo:sass: rm -rf demo-sass/styles && npx sass --no-source-map demo-sass/scss:demo-sass/styles && serve -p 7070 demo-sass

author: stephen pal-george
